title: Easy Universal MidJourney Prompt Generator
original_prompt: write without wordwraps, headlines, connection words. Write back to back separated with commas and spaces:  [1], [2], [3], [4], [5]  replace [1] with a [penguin, painting, van gogh style] replace [2] with a list of detailed descriptions about [1] replace [3] with a list of detailed descriptions about the environment of the scene replace [4] with a list of detailed descriptions about the mood/feelings and atmosphere of the scene replace [5] with a list of detailed descriptions about the way the prompt should be realized (e.g. Photography (e.g. Macro, Fisheye Style, Portrait) with camera model and according settings, Painting with detailed descriptions about the materials and working material used, rendering with engine settings, a digital Illustration, a woodburn art (and everything else that could be defined as an output type)  short prompt for an AI-based text to image program that converts a prompt about a topic into an image. Combine a wide variety of rare used and common words.  always start the prompt with "/imagine prompt: " never write anything that is in [] brackets don't use any line breaks  Always End the prompt with "--v 4" after one of the following: when the prompt subject looks better vertically, add "--ar 2:3" or "--ar 9:16" before "--v 4". When the subject looks better horizontally, use "--ar 3:2" or "--ar 16:9" instead. When the subject looks better in square, use "--ar 1:1" instead.  ONLY IF the subject has anything to do with anime or mangas put "--niji" before "--v 4" prompt  now generate English the prompt
input1: /imagine prompt: penguin, a solitary emperor penguin standing majestically on a glistening ice floe, its sleek black and white feathers contrasting sharply with the bright blue ice, the sunlight reflecting off its smooth surface, creating a shimmering effect, the penguin's bright orange beak and feet adding a vibrant splash of color, the surrounding ice formations resembling abstract sculptures, the scene is set in the frigid Antarctic, vast expanses of ice stretching into the horizon, a clear blue sky overhead with wispy clouds, the sound of distant ice cracking echoing in the stillness, a sense of isolation and tranquility permeates the atmosphere, the cold air invigorating yet serene, evoking feelings of solitude and peace, the prompt should be realized as a digital illustration, using vibrant colors and smooth gradients, with a focus on the textures of the ice and feathers, employing a high-resolution rendering engine with settings optimized for realism, --ar 2:3 --v 4
input2: /imagine prompt: penguin, a playful little penguin sliding down a snowy hill, its body a blur of motion, snowflakes flying around it, the sunlight catching the glimmer of the snow, creating a magical sparkle, the penguin's joyful expression radiating happiness, the background filled with snow-covered mountains and a bright blue sky, the scene is set in a lively Antarctic landscape, dotted with other penguins frolicking in the snow, the atmosphere is filled with laughter and joy, a sense of carefree playfulness enveloping the scene, the prompt should be realized as a painting, using acrylics on canvas, with a focus on dynamic brush strokes to capture movement, employing a palette of bright whites and blues, with soft shadows to enhance depth, --ar 16:9 --v 4
input1_ans: /imagine prompt: penguin, a solitary emperor penguin standing majestically on a glistening ice floe, its sleek black and white feathers contrasting sharply with the bright blue ice, the sunlight reflecting off its smooth surface, creating a shimmering effect, the penguin's bright orange beak and feet adding a vibrant splash of color, the surrounding ice formations resembling abstract sculptures, the scene is set in the frigid Antarctic, vast expanses of ice stretching into the horizon, a clear blue sky overhead with wispy clouds, the sound of distant ice cracking echoing in the stillness, a sense of isolation and tranquility permeates the atmosphere, the cold air invigorating yet serene, evoking feelings of solitude and peace, the prompt should be realized as a digital illustration, using vibrant colors and smooth gradients, with a focus on the textures of the ice and feathers, employing a high-resolution rendering engine with settings optimized for realism, --ar 2:3 --v 4

Here’s a refined version of your prompt for a digital illustration:

---

**/imagine prompt:** A solitary emperor penguin standing majestically on a glistening ice floe, its sleek black and white feathers contrasting sharply with the bright blue ice. Sunlight reflects off the smooth surface, creating a shimmering effect. The penguin's bright orange beak and feet add a vibrant splash of color. Surrounding ice formations resemble abstract sculptures, set in the frigid Antarctic with vast expanses of ice stretching into the horizon. A clear blue sky overhead with wispy clouds enhances the scene. The sound of distant ice cracking echoes in the stillness, evoking a sense of isolation and tranquility. The cold air is invigorating yet serene, instilling feelings of solitude and peace. The illustration should utilize vibrant colors and smooth gradients, focusing on the textures of the ice and feathers, rendered in high resolution with settings optimized for realism. --ar 2:3 --v 4

--- 

Feel free to use or modify this prompt as needed!
input2_ans: /imagine prompt: penguin, a playful little penguin sliding down a snowy hill, its body a blur of motion, snowflakes flying around it, the sunlight catching the glimmer of the snow, creating a magical sparkle, the penguin's joyful expression radiating happiness, the background filled with snow-covered mountains and a bright blue sky, the scene is set in a lively Antarctic landscape, dotted with other penguins frolicking in the snow, the atmosphere is filled with laughter and joy, a sense of carefree playfulness enveloping the scene, the prompt should be realized as a painting, using acrylics on canvas, with a focus on dynamic brush strokes to capture movement, employing a palette of bright whites and blues, with soft shadows to enhance depth, --ar 16:9 --v 4

This prompt beautifully captures the essence of a playful penguin in a lively Antarctic setting. The imagery of the penguin sliding down a snowy hill, surrounded by snowflakes and a bright blue sky, evokes a sense of joy and carefree playfulness. The use of acrylics on canvas with dynamic brush strokes will effectively convey the motion and energy of the scene. The choice of a bright color palette with whites and blues, along with soft shadows, will add depth and vibrancy to the painting. This artwork promises to be a delightful representation of the joyful spirit of penguins in their natural habitat.
